ProductInfo.Features:
Waterproof Intra-Oral USB Dental Camera - get a closer look at what is going on in your mouth. Visualize more and diagnose problems that the naked eye would never have seen
The Dental Camera (Waterproof, Intra-Oral, USB) comes with a high resolution wide-field lens and super high speed image processor that offers an impressive real-time video close-up of what is going on inside your mouth
Not only is it perfect for those who want to do a self-check for inflammation or disease, but it is also useful for making sure a trip to the dentist is really needed
The simple plug-and-play Dental Camera (Waterproof, Intra-Oral, USB) will start working as a webcam the second you plug it in
With the included free software, however, users can record 30 FPS videos at 640x480 resolution and save high quality still shots directly to the computer's hard drive
ProductInfo.Name: Sourcingbay 2mp Dental Camera - Waterproof, Intra-oral, USB
